item.description: Meet at the parking lot beside the ranger station. there is a $5 parking fee unless you have a season pass for MA state parks. MA residents age 62+ can get a free pass. Easy to moderate hike on the Overlook Trail.....approximately 1 1/2 hours but can find some other trails if we want to hike longer or all day if we want to;-). There are several trails including the M&M Trail. Also if you'd like to bring a picnic lunch in a cooler, there are tables near the pond and parking area. This is a gorgeous place. Much to do..a nice baseball ball field, horse shoe pits, dog friendly, kid friendly. We could do a summer gathering, barbecue and potluck maybe if enough responses and no rain...grrr. There are two pavilions but need enough responses before inquiring about one of them.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Wendell State Forest hike, picnic or barbecue after.
